named-query.name: getUnmatchedMovies
named-query.query: from Film f where f.imdbId is null or length(f.imdbId)=0 order by LOWER(f.nazivfilma) ASC

named-query.name: getZanrsOrdered
named-query.query: from Zanr z order by LOWER(z.zanr) ASC

named-query.name: getCountOfFilmWithZanrByName
named-query.query: select count(*) from Film where zanr=:zanr

named-query.name: getCountOfMedijOnPozicijaByName
named-query.query: select count(*) from Medij where pozicija=:pozicija

named-query.name: getCountOfMediumsWithMediumTypeByName
named-query.query: select count(*) from Medij where tipMedija=:tipMedija

named-query.name: getNextMedijIndeks
named-query.query: select max(indeks)+1 from Medij m where m.tipMedija.naziv=:tipMedija

named-query.name: getMedijsOrdered
named-query.query: from Medij m order by m.tipMedija.naziv, indeks

named-query.name: getUnusedMediums
named-query.query: from Medij m where m.films.size=0 order by m.tipMedija.naziv, indeks

named-query.name: getTipMedijaOrdered
named-query.query: from TipMedija t order by LOWER(t.naziv) ASC

named-query.name: getPozicijasOrdered
named-query.query: from Pozicija p order by LOWER(p.pozicija) ASC

named-query.name: getPozicijaDefault
named-query.query: from Pozicija p order by p.defaultPosition DESC, LOWER(p.pozicija) ASC

named-query.name: getTagsOrdered
named-query.query: from Tag t order by LOWER(t.naziv) ASC

named-query.name: getPreviousFieldValue
named-query.query: select value from Modification where entity = :entity and entityId = :entityId and field = :fieldName order by clock desc
